Review.Titre: I found the auctioneer to be rude and…
Review.Contenu: I found the auctioneer to be rude and dismissive. The bidding process was seamless.

Review.Titre: Unorganized and more difficult than it needed to be
Review.Contenu: Address of pickup location unclear in listing. No store name.  Once on site there were no signs that there was an auction pickup.  The check-in process was slack.  No receipts were given.  There were dangerous conditions.  Super wet floors in kitchen and no real organization of where to find your items. I never got e-mail confirmation of sale and I did not find it in spam.

I brought same items , rented a truck to pick the items , I payd 225$ in the truck , plus 65$ for the refill the gas truck , and he’s leaving earlier , when I call him , he told me a leave before 4pm the hours how we talk about , so I just loose money
Y’all are fraudsters…increasing bids after auction closes so that reserve high bids pay more than what the auction actually closed at. This is fraud under both state and federal statutes.

Review.Titre: not enough time to pick up items and…
Review.Contenu: not enough time to pick up items and the use of bad language with an old men such as f and sh words with an angry tone.

Charge higher than other auction house and will not help you load.They will not help you one bit, have to remove and load up yourself.No printed receipts were given, everything was done online and they wanted a picture of your license.

Review.Titre: Had to sign a form that said I received…
Review.Contenu: Had to sign a form that said I received my items before I could get my items. I won items that were not there to pick up.

Review.Titre: The site was easy to navigate
Review.Contenu: The site was easy to navigate. Mr Thompson was very professional. I wish there was a better description of the items.

Review.Titre: Auction was good. Item pickup, not so much
Review.Contenu: The auction itself was good, but when I arrived to pick up my items I had to find a way to take down my items from a 10ft wall. If I had been informed I’d have to disassemble the items, or that I needed to bring a ladder in order to reach them I would’ve been more prepared. I also saw others there picking up items that they had to disassemble as well. Just letting the auction winners know to bring their own tools in order to remove items would’ve been a big help.

Review.Titre: I bid on and won a vollrath commercial…
Review.Contenu: I bid on and won a vollrath commercial mixer.  The listing described the mixer as 1 year old,  when in fact, the mixer is 4 years old. A more accurate and truthful description would be best for your business,  and mine.

Review.Titre: I’m only answering this because a…
Review.Contenu: I’m only answering this because a survey was sent to me. So, I thought some of the stuff I bought was great. However, some stuff was broken, pieced together, and not exactly in the description. The cutting boards were listed as “new”. They were not. The food warmer needs a new plug. So on and so forth.

Review.Titre: Should have had email or text alerts…
Review.Contenu: Should have had email or text alerts for auction ending or updates.  Everything else was fine.
good experience.  a little more detail about lots, like a count on lots with multiple items.  will attend more auctions, thanks.

Review.Titre: love their actions and supply services…
Review.Contenu: love their actions and supply services thanks for waiting but the prices were to high ((
Working with you on receiving the product, thanks for helping me with my shipping, super great job 👍.

Review.Titre: The gentleman running the auction was…
Review.Contenu: The gentleman running the auction was super professional, quick and easy in and out the item descriptions lacked a little bit, and the pictures were not the greatest also one of the items I purchased was marked with the wrong number we were able to confirm so I got the right product than that great experience

Review.Titre: the customer service was great but the…
Review.Contenu: the customer service was great but the food not that well
Easy Peezy. Fast and helpful.
David was very helpful and Attentive to us. Great Job.Will continue do business soon.Chicano's Tacos & Tequila    Elgin SC.
The willingness of David Thompson to help with advice and even lending a hand. Great guy and great experience. Highly recommend!!
It was my first auction and I feel like it was very well done. Any questions I had were answered and then some. I would come back to an auction here for sure.
This was my first purchase through Madalyn Auctions. It was very simple and quick.
Setting up an account was easy and secure. Bidding process was straightforward and the pickup process was welcoming and items were in working condition and accurately described.
I was a seller and the process was pretty darn quick and easy. David was great about getting back to me when I had questions and I felt everything went really smooth. Thank you David.
Good pictures, like the hibid format, business well conducted during pickup.
David is fantastic.  The quality of the items he represents is truly wonderful.  His communication and timeliness is world-class.  Would recommend to others.
Very good experience. David is very knowledgeable about the appliances and doesn't mind lending a helping hand

Review.Contenu: David was very helpful and made the whole process run smooth
Smooth process and item was as specified.  Would highly recommend.
Enjoyed working with David.  Process is easy and quick.

Review.Titre: Everything was great quick pickup no…
Review.Contenu: Everything was great quick pickup no worries

Review.Titre: Real professional and easy to deal with

Review.Contenu: Friendly fast and fabulous work. I was in a hurry and needed a banner and they knocked it out of the park. Thank you very much.
The item was as advertised. The staff was helpful in loading up.
Good communication and quality products.  Items are “as described.”
Quick to respond, very polite and helpful
Easy sign up, easy bidding, easy pick up

Review.Contenu: Friendly and helpful as always
